channel.title: What keeps a connection logged in/connected?
channel.description:
I'm not great with all the protocol and player updating but I'm trying to work on some AI for experience with real connections.
I can get the connections to connect and the player spawns, but the player disconnects shortly afterwards. Is there something I need to do updating wise to keep this connection active? I can't see any errors displayed with the connection in the client or the server.
I was thinking maybe because I haven't made it constantly send data to the server and times out because it's idle?
Any help is appreciated.
